hooks.prompt: Check for uncommitted git changes in the vault. If uncommitted or unstaged changes exist: 1) Run git status and git diff --stat to see what changed 2) Generate a descriptive commit message based on the actual changes (e.g., 'Add task: review PR', 'Route meeting notes to Projects/Alpha', 'Process 3 inbox items') 3) Stage all changes with git add -A 4) Commit with the generated message. Also check claude-cortex subdirectory for changes and commit there too if needed. Return 'approve' when done or if no changes exist.
